title: "챗GPT"
subtitle: "Code Interpreter, Notable"
description: | 
  Code Interpreter, Notable, 오픈 소스 데이터 분석 AI 엔진을 살펴보자. 
author:
  - name: 이광춘
    url: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kwangchunlee/
    affiliation: 한국 R 사용자회
    affiliation-url: https://github.com/bit2r
title-block-banner: true
#title-block-banner: "#562457"
format:
  html:
    css: css/quarto.css
    theme: flatly
    code-fold: true
    code-tools: true
    code-link: true
    code-overflow: wrap
    toc: true
    toc-depth: 3
    toc-title: 목차
    number-sections: true
    highlight-style: github    
    self-contained: false
filters:
   - lightbox

lightbox: auto
link-citations: true
knitr:
  opts_chunk: 
    message: false
    warning: false
    collapse: true
    comment: "#>" 
    R.options:
      knitr.graphics.auto_pdf: true
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
notebook-view:
  - notebook: jupyterlab/pinecone.ipynb
    title: "벡터 DB 쥬피터 노트북"
---


![](images/chatgpt_code_interpreter.jpg)

# 챗GPT 시대 데이터 분석

-   OpenAI 챗GPT [Code Interpreter 플러그인](https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt-plugins#code-interpreter)
-   [노터블(Notable)](https://noteable.io/): EDA & ETL Made Easy (SQL, Python, & R)
-   [오픈소스 GPT-Code UI](https://github.com/ricklamers/gpt-code-ui)
-   R
    -   [RTutor.ai](http://rtutor.ai/), [GitHub 저장소](https://github.com/gexijin/RTutor)
    -   <https://chatlize.ai/>

# Code Interpreter

## 설정

유료구독하고 "Code Interpreter"를 활성화시킨다.

::: panel-tabset
### 1단계

![](images/rtutor/code_interpreter_02.webp)

### 2단계

![](images/rtutor/code_interpreter_03.webp)

### 3단계

![](images/rtutor/code_interpreter_04.webp)

### 4단계

![](images/rtutor/code_interpreter_05.webp)

### 5단계 (데이터+프롬프트)

![](images/rtutor/code_interpreter_import.jpg)
:::

## 심슨 패러독스

"챗GPT Code Interpreter"를 사용하여 분석한 사례

1.  챗GPT Code Interpreter : [채팅 이력](https://chat.openai.com/share/2e7237e6-c0ca-45b1-9254-4a4476430b19)
2.  Jupyter Notebook 다운로드: [`penguin_analysis.ipynb`](data/penguin_analysis.ipynb)
3.  `penguin_analysis.ipynb` → `penguin_analysis.qmd`
    -   명령어: `$ quarto convert penguin_analysis.ipynb`
4.  쿼토 컴파일: [바로가기](penguin_analysis.html)

# Notable.ai

[Notable](https://noteable.io/)은 챗GPT 플러그인으로 챗GPT 유료버전에서 [Notable](https://noteable.io/) 프로젝트와 데이터셋을 연결시키게 되면 분석을 수행할 수 있다.

![](images/notable.jpeg.jpg){fig-align="center" width="764"}

::: panel-tabset

![](images/notable_connect.jpg){fig-align="center" width="568"}
